title: Kayn R sometimes throws you out in an unwanted direction
body:
When using Kayns R and letting the time run out, iot seems to trow you out in the direction you had pointed at about 0.2 or 0.3 seconds  before the channel ends.
It gets very apparent when you use R and then spin the indicator around your target.
Can recreate this about 60% of the time.

How to recreate:
-Get Kayn to level 6 and learn his R
-Ult into a Target Dummy
-Spin your cursor around the target or flick the target indicatorfrom the left to the right of the Target just before the ability runs out
-Even though the indicator was pointing to the right when the cast endet, you get shot out to the left.

This hardly sounds like a bug, this sounds like someone not getting used to his ult mechanic
